abstract: WebMD has fortified its takeover defenses, as the beleaguered online health information provider continues to struggle with a falling stock price and profits.
snippet: WebMD has fortified its takeover defenses, as the beleaguered online health information provider continues to struggle with a falling stock price and profits.
lead_paragraph: WebMD has fortified its takeover defenses, as the beleaguered online health information provider continues to struggle with a falling stock price and profits.

headline.main: WebMD Extends Its Poison Pill Defense

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
